_comment: MOCK DATA FOR MVP - Replace with real data from SerpAPI/database later

events.name: Cherry Blossom Festival (Sakura)
events.description: Iconic cherry blossoms with hanami parties and night illuminations
events.cultural_notes: Peak bloom varies yearly, plan 1-2 weeks in advance, hanami parties are social gatherings
events.what_to_know: Bring picnic items, arrive early for good spots, night viewing is magical

events.name: Gion Festival
events.description: Traditional festival with elaborate floats and processions
events.cultural_notes: Wear yukata (traditional dress), respect sacred rituals
events.what_to_know: Main parade July 17th, book accommodation early, streets close to traffic

events.name: Autumn Foliage (Momiji)
events.description: Stunning red maple leaves, temples lit up at night
events.cultural_notes: Peak timing varies, temples often offer special night illuminations
events.what_to_know: Peak dates shift yearly, book popular temples in advance
